description: Get creative with the icing in this sugar cookies recipe, then wrap them up, decorate with ribbon and give to loved ones.
keywords: Cookie,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Baking,Christmas,Soy free,Vegetarian,Easter,Peanut free
name: Sugar Cookies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place butter, caster sugar and flour in a food processor. Process until mixture resembles fine crumbs. Add egg and vanilla, then process until mixture just comes together. Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface and knead gently until smooth. Divide mixture into 2 portions and shape into 2 discs. Wrap in baking paper and refrigerate for 30 minutes to rest.

Preheat oven to 170°C/150°C fanforced. Line 2 large baking trays with baking paper. Roll 1 dough portion between 2 sheets of baking paper until 5mm thick. Using a 6cm round cutter, cut rounds from dough, re-rolling and cutting scraps. Place on trays, 2cm apart, and bake, 1 tray at a time, for 10 minutes or until cookies are just firm to touch, but not browned. Transfer to a wire rack to cool. Repeat with remaining dough.
Sift icing sugar into a bowl. Add lemon juice and stir until smooth. Spread tops of cookies with icing. Sprinkle with 100s and 1000s, if using, then set aside for 1 hour or until set. Serve.
